name: Aesop’s Fables - A New Approach
description:
Aesop is a famous storyteller from Ancient Greece. The best fables of him are reinterpreted and modernized for a visual novel experience. All of these short stories are purely family-friendly and full with life lessons.

  • 70 Different Fables
  • Peaceful Music
  • Family-Friendly

It will be like a fairy tale full of smart animals.
